com.bot.worker.taskmanager

Class TaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bot.worker.EventBusComponent
      • com.bot.worker.taskmanager.TaskManager

  • public class TaskManager
extends EventBusComponent
    Master class to manage and execute tasks. For more info see methods annotated with @Subscribe

    Supported opperations

    • Schedule new task
    • Execute task with particular executor
    • Drop task
    • Put task on hold
    • Provide task(s) details

    All communication with other app components goes though event bus, look EventBusComponent for more info

    Author:
    Aleks
    See Also:
    Command, ConfigLoader, CliProcessor
